Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for Device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: EventControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains Event control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains Event control features.

Category.Name: EventExposureEndData
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains all the data features related to the ExposureEnd Event.
Category.Description: Category that contains all the data features related to the ExposureEnd Event.

Category.Name: EventFrameTriggerData
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains all the data features related to the FrameTrigger Event.
Category.Description: Category that contains all the data features related to the FrameTrigger Event.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that includes the LUT control features.
Category.Description: Category that includes the LUT control features.

Category.Name: DataRoiControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that includes the data ROI control features.
Category.Description: Category that includes the data ROI control features.

Category.Name: FanControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the cooling fan control features.
Category.Description: Category for the cooling fan control features.

Category.Name: FlatFieldCorrection
Category.ToolTip: Category for flat field correction features.
Category.Description: Category for flat field correction features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Transport layer control features.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major Version of the Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.
Integer.Description: Major Version of the Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor Version of the Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.
Integer.Description: Minor Version of the Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub Minor Version of Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.
Integer.Description: Sub Minor Version of Standard Feature Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s XML.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Areascan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 2D sensor
EnumEntry.Description: 2D sensor

EnumEntry.Name: Linescan
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 1D sensor
EnumEntry.Description: 1D sensor

Enumeration.Name: PclkSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects pixel clock.
Enumeration.Description: Selects pixel clock.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: SensorDigitizationTaps
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.
Enumeration.Description: Number of digitized samples outputted simultaneously by the camera A/D conversion stage.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image. The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image. This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontal
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together(applied to both direction at the same time).
Enumeration.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together(applied to both direction at the same time)..

Enumeration.Name: BinningVertical
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together(applied to both direction at the same time).
Enumeration.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together(applied to both direction at the same time)..

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The AOI is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: Total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyDiagonalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyDiagonalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from left-top to right-bottom at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from left-top to right-bottom at each frame.

Boolean.Name: SmearCorrection
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if smear correction is active.
Boolean.Description: Controls if smear correction is active. When activated, maximum framerate is a little lowered.

Boolean.Name: DefectivePixelCorrection
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if defective pixel correction is active.
Boolean.Description: Controls if defective pixel correction is active.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One frame is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the selected trigger.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

EnumEntry.Name: External
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that external input pin is used as trigger source.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that external input pin is used as trigger source.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame. This defines when a valid trigger will be accepted (or latched) for a new frame.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No trigger overlap is permitted.
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger overlap is permitted.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.

Integer.Name: TriggerDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto.
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of trigger signal pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration. Note that if TriggerActivation is RisingEdge, the exposure duration will be the time the trigger stays High. If TriggerActivation is FallingEdge, the exposure time will last as long as the trigger stays Low.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Integer.Name: ExposureTimeRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed.
Integer.Description: Sets the Exposure time (in microseconds) when ExposureMode is Timed. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is manually controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is manually controlled using ExposureTime.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.

Float.Name: ExposureAutoMin
Float.ToolTip: Sets lower limit in exposure auto mode(microseconds).
Float.Description: Sets lower limit in exposure auto mode(microseconds).

Float.Name: ExposureAutoMax
Float.ToolTip: Sets upper limit in exposure auto mode(microseconds).
Float.Description: Sets upper limit in exposure auto mode(microseconds).

Integer.Name: ExposureAutoTargetLevel
Integer.ToolTip: Controls gray level of image in ExposureAuto mode. It is adjusted to GainAuto and ApertureAuto mode too.
Integer.Description: Controls gray level of image in ExposureAuto mode. It is adjusted to GainAuto and ApertureAuto mode too.

Integer.Name: ExposureAutoTolerance
Integer.ToolTip: Determines when ExposureAuto is activated. If ExposureAuto is enabled and the difference between image level and target level is larger than this, ExposureAuto starts to work. It is adjusted to GainAuto and ApertureAuto mode too.
Integer.Description: Determines when ExposureAuto is activated. If ExposureAuto is enabled and the difference between image level and target level is larger than this, ExposureAuto starts to work. It is adjusted to GainAuto and ApertureAuto mode too.

Enumeration.Name: HighDynamicRangeMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if high dynamic ragne mode is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if high dynamic ragne mode is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables high dynamic ragne mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables high dynamic ragne mode.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable high dynamic ragne mode.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable high dynamic ragne mode.

Integer.Name: DynamicRangeIncrement
Integer.ToolTip: Sets dynamic range increment in dB when high dynamic range mode is active.
Integer.Description: Sets dynamic range increment in dB when high dynamic range mode is active.

Enumeration.Name: EventSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Event to signal to the host application.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just completed the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Device just completed the exposure of one Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameTrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device just received a trigger for the capture of one Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device just received a trigger for the capture of one Frame.

Enumeration.Name: EventNotification
Enumeration.ToolTip: Activate or deactivate the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.
Enumeration.Description: Activate or deactivate the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected Event notification is disabled.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected Event notification is disabled.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected Event notification is enabled.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected Event notification is enabled.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEnd
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the unique identifier of the ExposureEnd type of Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the unique identifier of the ExposureEnd type of Event. This feature can be used to register a callback function to be notified of the event occurrence. Its value uniquely identifies the type of event that will be received.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEndTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Timestamp of the ExposureEnd Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the Timestamp of the ExposureEnd Event. It can be used to determine precisely when the event occured.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEndFrameID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the unique Identifier of the Frame (or image) that generated the ExposureEnd Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the unique Identifier of the Frame (or image) that generated the ExposureEnd Event.

Integer.Name: EventFrameTrigger
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the unique Identifier of the FrameTrigger type of Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the unique Identifier of the FrameTrigger type of Event. It can be used to register a callback function to be notified of the event occurrence. Its value uniquely identify the type event received.

Integer.Name: EventFrameTriggerTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Timestamp of the AquisitionTrigger Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the Timestamp of the AquisitionTrigger Event. It can be used to determine precisely when the event occured.

Integer.Name: EventFrameTriggerFrameID
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the unique Identifier of the Frame (or image) that generated the FrameTrigger Event.
Integer.Description: Returns the unique Identifier of the Frame (or image) that generated the FrameTrigger Event.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogTap1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog gain will be applied to Tap 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog gain will be applied to Tap 1.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogTap2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog gain will be applied to Tap 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog gain will be applied to Tap 2.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogTap3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog gain will be applied to Tap 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog gain will be applied to Tap 3.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogTap4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Analog gain will be applied to Tap 4.
EnumEntry.Description: Analog gain will be applied to Tap 4.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalRed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the red digital channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the red digital channel.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalGreen
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the green digital channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the green digital channel.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalBlue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the blue digital channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the blue digital channel.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode. The exact algorithm used to implement AGC is device-specific.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is manually controlled using Gain.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is manually controlled using Gain.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device.

Float.Name: GainAutoMin
Float.ToolTip: Sets lower limit in gain auto mode.
Float.Description: Sets lower limit in gain auto mode.

Float.Name: GainAutoMax
Float.ToolTip: Sets upper limit in gain auto mode.
Float.Description: Sets upper limit in gain auto mode.

Enumeration.Name: GainAutoBalance
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode for automatic gain balancing between the sensor taps.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode for automatic gain balancing between the sensor taps. The gain coefficients of each channel or tap are adjusted so they are matched.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain tap balancing is manually controlled using Gain .
EnumEntry.Description: Gain tap balancing is manually controlled using Gain .

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain tap balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain tap balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain tap balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain tap balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: Tap1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to Tap 1.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to Tap 1.

EnumEntry.Name: Tap2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to Tap 2.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to Tap 2.

EnumEntry.Name: Tap3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to Tap 3.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to Tap 3.

EnumEntry.Name: Tap4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to Tap 4.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to Tap 4.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the green channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to the green channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to the red channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to the blue channel.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Integer.Name: BlackLevelRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as a raw integer value.
Integer.Description: Controls the analog black level as a raw integer value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is manually controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is manually controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the invertion of the signal of the line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the invertion of the signal of the line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal signal to output on the line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal signal to output on the line.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is disabled (Tri-State).
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is disabled (Tri-State).

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame.

EnumEntry.Name: StrobeOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Nearly same as ExposureActive, but can be delayed by StrobeOutDelay.
EnumEntry.Description: Nearly same as ExposureActive, but can be delayed by StrobeOutDelay.

EnumEntry.Name: PulseGenerator
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Outputs user-defined pulse signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Outputs user-defined pulse signal. Pulse signal is defined by PulsePeiod and PulseWidth

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of user output.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of user output.

Integer.Name: PulsePeriod
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the pulse period of pulse generator output(us).
Integer.Description: Sets the pulse period of pulse generator output(us).

Integer.Name: PulseWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the pulse width of pulse generator output(us).
Integer.Description: Sets the pulse width of pulse generator output(us).

Integer.Name: StrobeOutDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the delay of strobe output signal(us).
Integer.Description: Specifies the delay of strobe output signal(us).

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which LUT to contorl.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which LUT to contorl.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the index of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Controls the index of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.

Enumeration.Name: RoiSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which ROI(Region Of Interest) is controlled by the various ROI features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which ROI(Region Of Interest) is controlled by the various ROI features.

EnumEntry.Name: AE
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data ROI of ExposureAuto is selected.
EnumEntry.Description: Data ROI of ExposureAuto is selected.

EnumEntry.Name: AWB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data ROI of BalanceWhiteAuto is selected.
EnumEntry.Description: Data ROI of BalanceWhiteAuto is selected.

Integer.Name: RoiOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset of selected ROI.
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset of selected ROI.

Integer.Name: RoiWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Width of selected ROI.
Integer.Description: Width of selected ROI.

Integer.Name: RoiOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset of selected ROI.
Integer.Description: Vertical offset of selected ROI.

Integer.Name: RoiHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Height of selected ROI.
Integer.Description: Height of selected ROI.

Boolean.Name: RoiDisplay
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables display of selected ROI on the output image.
Boolean.Description: Enables display of selected ROI on the output image. On is effective while power is on. Next power up, it goes back to off automatically.

Enumeration.Name: FanOperationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets operation mode of fan.
Enumeration.Description: Sets operation mode of fan.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: don't operate fan.
EnumEntry.Description: don't operate fan.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: operate fan.
EnumEntry.Description: operate fan.

EnumEntry.Name: Temperature
EnumEntry.ToolTip: fan operation is controlled by temperature.
EnumEntry.Description: fan operation is controlled by temperature. Only if temperature is higher than the value specified by FanOperationTemperature, fan operates.

Integer.Name: FanOperationTemperature
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies temperature over which fan operates when FanOperationMode is temperature.
Integer.Description: Specifies temperature over which fan operates when FanOperationMode is temperature.

Float.Name: FanSpeed
Float.ToolTip: displays revolution speed of fan in rpm(revolutions per minute).
Float.Description: displays revolution speed of fan in rpm(revolutions per minute).

Enumeration.Name: FfcMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets Flat Field Correction mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets Flat Field Correction mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets not to use Flat Field Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets not to use Flat Field Correction.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets to use Flat Field Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets to use Flat Field Correction.

Integer.Name: FfcTargetLevel
Integer.ToolTip: Sets average gray level of background after adjusting Flat Field Correction.
Integer.Description: Sets average gray level of background after adjusting Flat Field Correction.

Enumeration.Name: FfcFrames
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets how many frames are used when generating Flat Field data.
Enumeration.Description: Sets how many frames are used when generating Flat Field data.

Command.Name: FfcSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves current Flat Field data to nonvolatile memory.
Command.Description: Saves current Flat Field data to nonvolatile memory.

Command.Name: FfcLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads Flat Field data from nonvolatile memory.
Command.Description: Loads Flat Field data from nonvolatile memory.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.DisplayName: Gev Device Mode Is Big Endian

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceClass
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the class of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the class of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the network interface.
Integer.Description: MAC address of the network interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

EnumEntry.Name: StreamChannel0BigAndLittleEndian
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Stream Channel 0 Big And Little Endian

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the subnet mask of the given interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the subnet mask of the given interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file. The First URL is used as the first choice by the application to retrieve the XML device description file.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent IP address for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent IP address for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the persistent default gateway for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Controls the persistent default gateway for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated by the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated by the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Controls the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks in 1 second (frequency in Hz).

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device access privilege of an application.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSocket
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the UDP source port of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the address of the primary application.
Integer.Description: Returns the address of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Controls the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Controls the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Enumeration.Name: GevSCPDirection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Reports the direction of the stream channel.
Enumeration.Description: Reports the direction of the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: StreamHold
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if stream channel holds streaming data.
Boolean.Description: Controls if stream channel holds streaming data. If Acquisition isn't started, device doesn't grap images regardless of this setting. On is effective while power is on. Next power up, it goes back to off automatically.

Integer.Name: FrameCapacity
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates how many frames could be stored in internal memory at one time.
Integer.Description: Indicates how many frames could be stored in internal memory at one time.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting User set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting User set. Saving to this set is not permitted.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the first user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the first user set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the second user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the second user set.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefaultSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select the first User Set.
EnumEntry.Description: Select the first User Set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select the second User Set.
EnumEntry.Description: Select the second User Set.
